datafield.subfield: Encontro Internacional de Direito da América do Sul
Encuentro Internacional de Derecho de América del Sur
THIS 1XX FIELD CANNOT BE USED UNDER RDA UNTIL THIS RECORD HAS BEEN REVIEWED AND/OR UPDATED
A integração rumo ao século XXI, 1996:

t.p. (V Encontro Internacional de Direito da América do Sul) p. 7 (Encuentro Internacional de Derecho de América del Sur) p. 649 (has been meeting for 5 yrs; originated in Brazil, with first 2 mtgs. held there; 3rd mtg. held in Asunción, 4th in Montevideo, 5th in Buenos Aires, and 6th scheduled for Santiago, Chile)
